Sentencas: This paper focuses on the cathode and current collector layers of a co-sintered, all-ceramic solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) concept.
Titulo: Investigation of LSM/8YSZ cathode within an all-ceramic SOFC, Part II: Optimization of performance and co-sinterability

Sentencas: Challenges to reach good electrochemical performance have to be overcome, due to more demanding manufacturing conditions, including a relatively high co-sintering temperature.
Titulo: Investigation of LSM/8YSZ cathode within an all-ceramic SOFC, Part II: Optimization of performance and co-sinterability

Sentencas: Master sintering curves show that the sintering activity of lanthanum strontium manganite (LSM) is significantly higher than that of 8-mol% yttria stabilized zirconia (8YSZ).
Titulo: Investigation of LSM/8YSZ cathode within an all-ceramic SOFC, Part II: Optimization of performance and co-sinterability

Sentencas: By applying a double-layered cathode and a current collector with optimized microstructures the best electrochemical performance of the cathode is 0.26 Omega cm(2) M 800 degrees C, evaluated from polarization resistances of 8YSZ electrolyte-supported symmetric cells post-sintered at 1150 degrees C < T < 1250 degrees C.
Titulo: Investigation of LSM/8YSZ cathode within an all-ceramic SOFC, Part II: Optimization of performance and co-sinterability

Sentencas: The cathode and current collector materials are adapted to fit the co-sintering process by adjustment of the paste compositions.
Titulo: Investigation of LSM/8YSZ cathode within an all-ceramic SOFC, Part II: Optimization of performance and co-sinterability

Sentencas: Half-cells consisting of silicate mechanical support, LSM current collector, LSM mixed with 8YSZ composite cathode and 8YSZ electrolyte are co-sintered porous and defect-free at 1150 degrees C < t < 1250 degrees C.
Titulo: Investigation of LSM/8YSZ cathode within an all-ceramic SOFC, Part II: Optimization of performance and co-sinterability
